    • Constructor Detail

      • PageData

        public PageData(java.util.UUID pageId,
        int layoutId)
        Constructor that sets the ID of the page represented by this object and the index of the layout the page will instantiate
        Parameters:
        pageId - ID of the page represented by this object
        layoutId - Value to set as the index of the layout the page will instantiate
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the layout index is invalid, i.e. not a number between 0 and 4
